title: Baseball Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Baseball Scoreboard plugin - displays live, recent, and upcoming MLB, MiLB, and NCAA Baseball games

enabled.description: Enable or disable the baseball scoreboard plugin

display_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the display controller to show this plugin mode before rotating to next plugin

update_interval.description: How often to fetch new data in seconds

game_display_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each individual game before rotating to the next game within the same mode

favorite_teams.description: List of favorite MLB team abbreviations (e.g., NYY, BOS, LAD). Use 2-3 letter codes.

display_modes.title: Display Modes
display_modes.description: Control which game types to show

live_display_mode.description: Display mode for live games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

recent_display_mode.description: Display mode for recent games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

upcoming_display_mode.description: Display mode for upcoming games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

scroll_settings.title: Scroll Settings
scroll_settings.description: Settings for scroll display mode (when display mode is set to 'scroll')

scroll_speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second (default: 50). Higher values scroll faster.

scroll_delay.description: Delay between scroll frames in seconds (default: 0.01 = 100 FPS). Lower values = smoother scrolling.

gap_between_games.description: Gap in pixels between game cards when scrolling

show_league_separators.description: Show league icons (MLB shield, NCAA logos) between different leagues

dynamic_duration.description: Automatically calculate display duration based on content width

live_priority.description: Give live games priority over other modes. When enabled, live games will interrupt the normal mode rotation and be displayed immediately when available.

live_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to display each live game before rotating to the next live game

recent_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each recent game before rotating to the next game. If not set, uses the top-level game_display_duration setting (default: 15 seconds).

upcoming_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each upcoming game before rotating to the next game. If not set, uses the top-level game_display_duration setting (default: 15 seconds).

live_update_interval.description: How often to update live game data (seconds)

update_interval_seconds.description: How often to fetch new data for this league (seconds)

game_limits.title: Game Limits
game_limits.description: Control how many games to show

recent_games_to_show.description: With favorites: N games per favorite team. Without favorites: N total games sorted by time.

upcoming_games_to_show.description: With favorites: N games per favorite team. Without favorites: N total games sorted by time.

show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show games from favorite teams

show_all_live.description: Show all live games, not just favorites

mode_durations.title: Mode Duration Overrides
mode_durations.description: Override how long each mode displays before rotating

recent_mode_duration.description: Override display duration for recent games mode (seconds). Null uses default.

upcoming_mode_duration.description: Override display duration for upcoming games mode (seconds). Null uses default.

live_mode_duration.description: Override display duration for live games mode (seconds). Null uses default.

dynamic_duration.title: MLB Dynamic Duration Settings
dynamic_duration.description: Configure dynamic duration settings for MLB games.

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for MLB games

min_duration_seconds.description: Minimum total duration in seconds for this mode, even if few games are available. Ensures the mode stays visible long enough.

max_duration_seconds.description: Maximum total duration in seconds for this mode, even if many games are available.

modes.title: Per-Mode Settings for MLB
modes.description: Configure dynamic duration for specific MLB modes

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for MLB live games

min_duration_seconds.description: Minimum duration for MLB live mode

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for MLB live games

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for MLB recent games

min_duration_seconds.description: Minimum duration for MLB recent mode

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for MLB recent games

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for MLB upcoming games

min_duration_seconds.description: Minimum duration for MLB upcoming mode

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for MLB upcoming games
